title: Season's Table - Kyejeol Babsang
description: Serves meat, veg options available. All-you-can-eat buffet restaurant on the 7th floor of iPark mall, Yongsan station (near CGV cinema). Seasonal food includes a bibimbap station (multiple varieties of rice, vegetable side dishes and dressings), various vegetable fritters, pancakes and snacks. Dessert table includes sweet rice cakes and fruit salads.
